bibl.title: The Nile Waters, the Sun, and Capricorn: A Greek Prose Fragment in Ann Arbor.

series.title: American Studies in Papyrology. Special Edition

bibl.title: Adam HYATT (Assistant Editor), Proceedings of the 25th International Congress of Papyrology. Ann Arbor, July 29 - August 4, 2007
bibl.author: RENNER, Timothy

bibl.note: Provenance unknown (acquired through purchase), first cent. BCE or first cent. CE. Fragment of the work of a geographer or a historian. The passage deals with the problem of the Nile inundation.
RENNER Timothy, The Nile Waters, the Sun, and Capricorn: A Greek Prose Fragment in Ann Arbor.

Traianos GAGOS (Editor), Adam HYATT (Assistant Editor), Proceedings of the 25th International Congress of Papyrology. Ann Arbor, July 29 - August 4, 2007 = American Studies in Papyrology. Special Edition (Ann Arbor, 2010) pp. 663-669, 1 pl. coul.
